name: RogueJack
description:
It's a Rogue and Blackjack mash-up for the # KenneyJam!

Use the arrows to move ...

...walk into a monster to start playing Blackjack

Keep pushing toward the monster to take another card or pull away to stay and find out if you won the battle.

  • Art by Kenney of course
  • Music by RandomMind
  • SFX made with BFXR
